member.name: D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for the properties of the 3D Lookup Table effect.

member.name: D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP.D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP_LUT
member.summary: The D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP_LUT property is a pointer to an object. The default value is null.

member.name: D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP.D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP_ALPHA_MODE
member.summary: The D2D1_LOOKUPTABLE3D_PROP_ALPHA_MODE property is a value indicating the alpha mode of the input file. See the About Alpha Modes section of the Supported Pixel Formats and Alpha Modes topic for additional information.
